channel.title: "java" is not recognized as an external command
channel.description: can someone please help me, i downloaded java on my VPS, but this shows when i try to run it, help will be really appreciated!

item.title: "java" is not recognized as an external command
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You need to set your path variable to include the Java directory.

Closed because this question is asked and answered way to often.

Read full topic
item.source: "java" is not recognized as an external command
